authors.author: One Hope Project. Josh Gauton and Joe Wells 2011

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
When I call, you answer
When I fall, you are by my side
When I'm weak you are stronger
My deliverer

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Mighty, God above all
I'm held within your hands
Father, You listen and love
Forever by my side
Let this truth run deep

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
When you breathe, I'm made whole
When you move, help me follow too
When you speak, I find comfort,
My deliverer

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
When your light shines, it breaks the darkness
Lifts me up and hope prevails
In your presence, there is healing
Life abundant found in you
